main event: An aerial object was sighted in the southeast and disappeared in the northeast after 55 seconds.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 55 seconds,The object appeared as a dimly blinking light,The observer believed it to be a flying saucer,The object maneuvered during the sighting, and the witness reported feeling shaken by the experience.
witness description: A 15-year-old male, in 10th grade with a great interest in science.
